featured.text: The entire island of Kizhi is, 18 , an outdoor museum of wooden architecture created in 1966.
The jewel of the architecture is the 22-domed Transfiguration Church, built in the early 1700s.
Located at the heart of Paris, this medieval cathedral is 21 for its intricate architecture, stunning stained glass windows, and, above all, its bells.
26 some six hundred years of architecture nearly untouched by natural disaster or war, the city retains much of its medieval appearance.

definition.zh_def: 建築學；建築的藝術或技術。
definition.en_def: The art or practice of designing and constructing buildings.
definition.example: The architecture of the new library is both modern and functional.
